title: A Step towards Sustainable Farming: Sustainable Guar Project

tasks.task: Participate in a sustainable agriculture project
subtasks: Attend training sessions on soil knowledge
Collect soil samples for analysis
Understand and implement package of practices recommended by soil test reports
Learn about and adopt sustainable water management techniques
Actively participate in project expansion to 25 villages
Encourage and train women farmers
Express gratitude towards project supporters (Saigal Foundation and ASLAND)
Apply recommended seeds, fertilizers, and micronutrients
Cultivate around 25,000 acres by 2025

tasks.task: Participate in a sustainable agriculture project
subtasks: Attend training sessions on soil knowledge
Collect soil samples for analysis
Understand and implement package of practices based on soil tests
Learn about and adopt sustainable water management techniques

tasks.task: Participate in the project. Under that, subtasks like attending training, collecting soil samples, understanding the soil test reports, applying the recommended practices, etc. Also, since women are part of the project, promoting women's involvement could be a task.
Manage a demonstration plot. Subtasks could be planting the crops with the correct seeds and inputs, following sustainable practices, etc.
Participate in a sustainable agriculture project
Manage a demonstration plot under sustainable practices

subtasks: Physically go to the field to collect soil samples
Transport soil samples to the testing facility
Mix fertilizers and micronutrients with seeds before planting
Spread recommended amounts of fertilizer and micronutrients on the fields
Physically demonstrate the correct planting techniques to fellow farmers
Encourage women farmers to join the project
Train women farmers in the package of practices
Plant cover crops
Practice no-till planting
Apply organic mulch
Water and irrigate the plot as per the project's recommendations

tasks.task: Participate in a sustainable agriculture project
subtasks: Collect soil samples for analysis

tasks.task: Manage a demonstration plot for the sustainable agriculture project
subtasks: Properly sow seeds, fertilize, and apply micronutrients based on soil tests
Spread compost or manure on the fields
Collect soil samples and prepare for testing
Apply recommended seeds, fertilizers, and micronutrients
Monitor and maintain the plot according to project guidelines

tasks.task: Promote sustainable agriculture in the local community. This could include various subtasks like collecting samples, applying inputs, conducting trainings, and promoting women's involvement.
